name: Run
effect: Gain X _Temporary_ _Movement_.

name: Charge
effect: Choose any _Ability_, paying any portion of its Cost, then become _Charging_. You must take your _Turn_ next _Phase_ as a _Slow Action_. On said _Turn_, you must first remove _Charging_, then pay the remaining cost of the chose _Ability_ and use it immediately, if able. If you cannot, any paid Cost is lost.

name: Envenom
reqs: _Graze_+ with a _Natural_ Weapon and the Attack dealt at least 1 Damage.
effect: Add _Poisoned_ 2 to the Attack.

name: Raise Guard
effect: Gain _Guarding_ 2.

boosts.name: Take Cover
boosts.effect: If you have _Cover_, gain 1 _Guard_ against all Attacks while you have any _Guarding_.

name: Disengage
trigger: You would create an _Opening_ due to spending _Movement_.
effect: Instead, do not create an _Opening_.
special: If you are in a Mobility Stance, the first use each _Phase_ has a Cost of None.

name: Rally
effect:
Choose X. You may repeat the same option:
* You or the Target _Recovers_.
* You or the Target clears 4 _Stun_.

name: Breather
effect: Clear 2X _Stun_.
special: You may use this Action as a Reaction at the end of the _Phase_.

name: Unbalance
effect: Inflict _Exposed_ [4 _Focus_] on the Target, as well as 2 _Stun_.

name: Counter
effect: Choose an Attack with a Range of _Melee_, paying its Cost with a _Discount_ of 2. Automatically resolve that Attack as if it was a _Hit_ against the Attacker if they are in Range.

name: Perfect Guard
effect: The triggering Attack is [_Glancing_].
special: The cost is instead None if you are in a _Defensive_ _Stance_.

name: Opportunity Attack
trigger: A creature you are _Engaged_ with creates an _Opening_.
effect: Use a Single-Target Attack [_Discount_ 2] against the triggering creature.

name: Lethal Blow
effect: Deal 3 _Bonus_ _Damage_.

name: Guard Breaker
effect: Add _Break_ [_Focus_] to the triggering Attack or deal +5 _Bonus Stun_.

name: Find Advantage
effect: Add _Impaired_ and 2 _Stun_ to the original Attack, even if it was a _Miss_. In addition, you may _Prepare_ 2 on the Attack used for this Gambit.

name: Dodge
effect: Gain +1 _Reflex_. The triggering Attack deals half Damage and you have _Advantage_ to _Negate_. Roll a d6; on a 5 or less, you may not use any ability with Dodge in its name until next _Round_

boosts.name: Dive
boosts.effect: Instead, decrease the Rank of the triggering Attack by 2. Gain _Prone_.

name: Use Environment
effect: Resolve the Interaction effect of a piece of _Terrain_ within Range, paying its listed _Cost_.

name: Drop
effect: Stop _Wielding_ a piece of _Equipment_, placing it unused in your _Arena_.

boosts.name: Drop Belt
boosts.effect: Instead remove an _Equipped_ piece of _Equipment_, placing it unused in your _Arena_.

boosts.name: Drop Pack
boosts.effect: Create an [_Opening_] and instead remove your _Pack_, placing it unused in your _Arena_.

name: Draw/Stow
effect: _Wield_ an _Equipped_ Item, or _Equip_ a  _Wielded_ Item.

boosts.name: Retrieve
boosts.effect: Create an [_Opening_]. Instead _Wield_ or _Equip_ an _Unattended_ piece of _Equipment_ in your _Arena_.

boosts.name: Trade
boosts.effect: Choose an ally within _Melee_ _Range_. They may immediately _Wield_ or _Equip_ an Item you have _Wielded_ or _Equipped_, or vice versa. You may use this at no cost by creating an [_Opening_].

name: Manifest
effect:
Choose one:
* _Summon_ your _Spirit_ to a valid _Arena_ within Range. You may choose to make them _Engaged_ with any valid creature if the _Range_ is _Close_+.
* _Recall_ your _Spirit_.

name: Combination Strike
effect: Your Spirit may immediately use a Single-Target Attack [_Discount_ 2] against the same Target.

name: Interdiction
effect: You and your Spirit are both targeted by the triggering effect, but take half Damage/_Stun_ each and _Negate_ with _Advantage_.

name: Brawl
effect:
Choose one, then Attack a Target within Range:
* <u>Disorient:</u> Deal _0/1/2/2_ _Damage_ and inflict _Impaired_/_Exposed_.
* <u>Overpower:</u> Inflict _Push_ [_Grit_], _Prone_ [_Grit_/_Reflex_] or _Grabbed_ [_Grit_/_Reflex_].
* <u>Steal:</u> Inflict _Disarm_ [_Grit_/_Reflex_]. The Target has _Advantage_ to _Negate_ if they are _Wielding_ the item.
special: If you have _Kinesis_ you may add [_Spirit_], pay all cost in _Essence_, and use this at your _Kinesis_ range. You may only target a creature if they have a significant amount of the _Kinesis_ _Element_ and may not choose to inflict _Grabbed_. If you choose the <u>Steal</u> option they instead must only have an Item that matches the _Element_, but you must target that Item.

name: Block
effect: Gain +1 _Grit_. Make a _Defense Roll_ and apply the result. You have _Disadvantage_ on the roll if you are not _Wielding_ a _Versatile_ or _Heavy_ _Weapon_ and the Attack is _Heavy_ or if you are not _Wielding_ a Shield and the Attack is not _Melee_.
special: Every time you use a _Reaction_ with Block in its name, increase the Cost of all others with Block in its name by 1 until the end of the _Phase_.

name: Brace
effect: _Defend_, at _Disadvantage_ if the Attack was not _Melee_ or was _Heavy_. Gain +1 to _Negate_.

name: Elemental Control
effect: _Bend_ 1 of the same Element as this Spirit's Type.
special: Add this Spirit's Type to the Keywords.

name: Metallic Reconstitution
effect: Gain 4 _Vigor_. If triggering this based on _Equipment_, reduce the _Durability_ of said _Equipment_ by 1.

name: Metallic Splintering
effect: Take 2 Damage. Create a Size 0 _Metal Shard_.

name: Earthen Reconstitution
effect: Gain 3 _Vigor_. If triggering this based on _Equipment_, reduce the _Durability_ of said _Equipment_ by 1.
